name: CapitalQuizzes
0:
”Alexa, open capital quizzes”
”Alexa, launch capital quizzes”
”Alexa, start capital quizzes”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: capital quizzes
Developer Terms of Use
des:
"Capitals Quiz" is an Alexa skill that tests your knowledge about the capitals of the worlds.
This game features all the capitals of the world!
Users are presented with a series of statements about the capitals of the world and must answer "yes" or "no."
Each time the user guesses the answer, they earn one point. Every ten questions the user's point will be announced.
The multiplayer mode supports up to two players.
In the multiplayer mode each 20 questions will reveal the players' scores.
